meanings.sent1: The dicarboxylic acid had a sour taste.
meanings.sent2: She synthesized a dicarboxylic compound in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The dicarboxylic molecule threw a party for other molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as diverse as a dicarboxylic structure.
meanings.sent5: The dicarboxylic nature of the substance made it highly reactive.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a compound containing two carboxyl groups.
meanings.sent1: The dicarboxylic properties of the substance were well-studied.
meanings.sent2: Researchers analyzed the dicarboxylic structure of the molecule.
meanings.sent3: The dicarboxylic compound was the talk of the chemistry conference.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a dicarboxylic maze of interconnected ideas.
meanings.sent5: The dicarboxylic characteristics of the material made it ideal for the experiment.
